prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Reed, Drums, Guitar, Bass, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Reed, Drums, Guitar, and Bass, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Reed, Drums, Guitar, and Bass, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
Reed, Drums, Guitar, and Bass are all present in this song, but Piano is not.
